cause.description:
tracnet is the lifelong project of Peter B whose life was changed while doing business in african countries that got taken over by genocide
all the greatest empowerment crises from ending malaria up require a transformation in transparency mapping and end to end accountability
you can see the most inspiring rights leader we know of : Mary Robinson clarify grassroots fire http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nJUBpg2xcf4
you can support http://www.tr-ac-net.org - drill down to ending malaria http://www.tr-ac-net.org/donate/RMsections01.php?vs=malaria linked to expert activists of http://immconsortium.org or empower children through other local projects http://www.tr-ac-net.org/DBadmin/DBdonate005.php?vv1=114&vv2=AAA&vv3=1&vv4=3&vv5=1&vv6=1&vv7=1&vv8=0&vv9=13588
or find out more about Transparency's 2 Peters B & C http://ecomap.tv/_wsn/page2.html
1. sustain children; eg end malaria
2. compound transparency
3. empower grassroots flow/ fire
cause.mission: Sustain Children; Transform Transparency Rights; Empower Grassroots Fire
cause.name: empower End to End Accountability -tracnet
